person.persName: Spencer H. Segroves (Greene Co. AK, farmer and sergeant 1st Ky Light Artillery )

body.p: Greene County, Arkansas, farmer and soldier. North Carolina native. Son of Albert Segroves and Rebecca Segroves. Married to Maggie A. Rollins Segroves in Montgomery County, Kentucky, on February 2, 1865. Student in Chatham County, North Carolina, in 1850. Farmer in Greene County, Arkansas, in 1860. Served in the 1st Kentucky Light Artillery (U.S.A.) as private and sergeant from September 10, 1864, to July 26, 1865.
